trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Activate a Role
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Activate a Role

trans-unit.source: Learn how to activate roles for privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to activate roles for privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.

trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Activate or Deactivate a Role
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Activate or Deactivate a Role

trans-unit.source: Activating or Deactivating a Role
trans-unit.target: Activating or Deactivating a Role

trans-unit.source: Log in to [http://portal.azure.com](http://portal.azure.com).
trans-unit.target: Log in to [http://portal.azure.com](http://portal.azure.com).

trans-unit.source: Follow the steps in [Getting Started with Azure Privileged Identity Management](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-getting-started.md) to place Azure PIM on the portal dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Follow the steps in [Getting Started with Azure Privileged Identity Management](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-getting-started.md) to place Azure PIM on the portal dashboard.

trans-unit.source: After you have completed the steps in the Security Wizard, you will see the main menu of Azure PIM.
trans-unit.target: After you have completed the steps in the Security Wizard, you will see the main menu of Azure PIM.

trans-unit.source: Click on **Activate my role**.
trans-unit.target: Click on **Activate my role**.

trans-unit.source: A list of roles that have been assigned to you will appear.
trans-unit.target: A list of roles that have been assigned to you will appear.

trans-unit.source: Click on the role you want to activate.
trans-unit.target: Click on the role you want to activate.

trans-unit.source: Click **Activate**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Activate**.

trans-unit.source: The **Request role activation** blade will appear.
trans-unit.target: The **Request role activation** blade will appear.

trans-unit.source: Enter the reason for the activation request in the text field.
trans-unit.target: Enter the reason for the activation request in the text field.

trans-unit.source: Click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: The role will now be activated.
trans-unit.target: The role will now be activated.

trans-unit.source: Once a role has been activated you can also deactivate a role by clicking **Deactivate**.
trans-unit.target: Once a role has been activated you can also deactivate a role by clicking **Deactivate**.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the role can be removed from the user by using the steps in [Adding or Removing a Role](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-how-to-add-role-to-user.md).
trans-unit.target: Additionally, the role can be removed from the user by using the steps in [Adding or Removing a Role](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-how-to-add-role-to-user.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about role activation settings see [How to Configure Role Activation](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-how-to-configure-role-activation.md)
trans-unit.target: For more information about role activation settings see [How to Configure Role Activation](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-how-to-configure-role-activation.md)

trans-unit.source: For more information about security alerts specific to role activation settings see [How to Configure Security Alerts](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-how-to-configure-security-alerts).
trans-unit.target: For more information about security alerts specific to role activation settings see [How to Configure Security Alerts](active-directory-privileged-identity-management-how-to-configure-security-alerts).

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps
